event.title: Accelerate Your Career With Microsoft Dynamics AX Training
event.description:
Dynamics AX is a piece of business software made by Microsoft. It’s an enterprise resource management (ERP) program that helps businesses manage the back-end operations that keep it running on a day-to-day basis.

This Microsoft Dynamics AX Course covers all the areas like business intelligence, warehouse management, financial management, retail and e-commerce, inventory management, project management, service management, human resources, manufacturing, and distribution. Enroll now to become a master in ERP.

Course Features:

30 Days of Instructor-Led Dynamics AX Training
Real World use cases and Scenarios
Practical Approach
Expert & Certified Trainers

About KBS:

KBS is one of the leading Online training providers with a decade of experience in the Online IT training Industry. We trained thousands of students and even handled hundreds of corporates clients across the world.
KBS offers the best training in the industry with industry expert trainers. Some of our on-demand courses such as ServiceNow, Business Intelligence, RPA, Blockchain, and Cyber Security.

Key Features:

Flexible Timings
Certified & Industry Experts Trainers
Multiple Training Delivery Models
Customize Course
24/7 Support
Hands-On Experience
Real-Time Use Cases
Q&A with Trainers
Job Support
Placement Assistance.
